1.name: letter_use_1
1.text: You used letter '{target}' {count} times in this one!

2.name: letter_use_2
2.text: I see {count} occurrences of '{target}' in this tweet...

3.name: letter_use_3
3.text: What can be better than using '{target}' {count} times? Exactly! Not using it at all...

4.name: letter_use_3
4.text: What if '{target}' was a number? Than you've used '{count}' {target} times!
